Content_FullWidth.Name: Hotel Listings
Content_FullWidth.Title: Hotel Listings
Content_FullWidth.BodyCopy:
Boise Hawaii Rexburg Logan, UT Salt Lake City, UT Provo/Orem, UT
BYU-Idaho has contracts with local hotels to assist with the lodging of overnight guests and conference planning. This website provides information on pricing and customer service contracts. If you require additional information, click on the name of the underlined hotel to see their individual websites, or contact Purchasing & Travel at 496-2340
The Travel Office will be glad to help with business-related hotel reservations. Hotel properties require a credit card to hold the reservations for your hotel. Please include your credit card number with hotel requests.
*Note: Each hotel has a listed date for which information was last updated. Pay attention to special instructions in the right column to help you with your reservations. Pricing is subject to change without notification.

*LaQuinta discounts are available nationwide for business and leisure travel. Visit www.lq.com and enter booking code BYUTVL. Under the column labeled 'Best Available Rate' click on the link that says "CHECK BYUTVL RATES NOW." You will then see the discounted rate.
